panels.description: Cont of AER in system logs per GPU:  Advanced Error Reporting by PCI Express devices
panels.title: Machine GPU AER_ ERRORS

panels.description: Current error state for GPU (2 for error, 1 for no error, 0 unknown state)
panels.title: Machine GPU Error State

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{} - node_memory_Buffers_bytes{} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{})) / sum by(instance) (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{}) * 100
